subject: Fwd: [EXTERNAL] Re: betreft factuur en betaalbewijs 1Z144AW70400437911-144AW737KTD
description_text:
Hey, What do you want me to do? Getting a bit annoyed with this??‍♂️ I can pay but is going to be about 150-200 us. Will you pay that fee or split it? Since you didn’t tell the customs you would pay it but it would be me. I just want the pedals to make the video Med vänlig hälsning Alex Reinholdsson +46(0)738 - 24 33 88 Vidarebefordrat mejl: Från: hnguyen@ups.com Datum: 19 september 2025 14:03:15 CEST Till: alexander.reinholdsson@gmail.com Kopia: akaurnijar@ups.com, inesradstake@ups.com, hnguyen@ups.com, nlbrokerage@ups.com Ämne: RE: [EXTERNAL] Re: betreft factuur en betaalbewijs 1Z144AW70400437911-144AW737KTD ﻿

 
 
 


 
 Good afternoon Mr. Reinholdsson, 
 
 Thank you for your e-mail. Apologies for the delay. 
 
 Your shipment is held by Dutch Customs due to incorrect customs valuation. There seems to be a misunderstanding on how to correctly determine the customs value of goods in case
 for testing/samples. 
 
 For customs valuation purposes, customs authorities will value test samples as if they had been bought/sold*. This means in your case the customs valuation will be higher than
 the 10,00 USD mentioned on the invoice. This will also lead to a higher customs debt in import duties and import VAT. 
 
 Looking at the website of the supplier/shipper the fair price total value for these goods would be 676,00 USD: 
 
 Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional 
PLUS X P3-H3 SILVER WITH BASEPLATE 299,00 USD 
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=51288365072698 
 
 Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional 
PRO X ULTRA-P3-H3 WITH BASEPLATE 377,00 USD 
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714 
 
 
 Can you please confirm whether or not you agree with above valuation?
It is also possible to return the goods to sender. 
 
 We look forward to your reply. 
 
 *The shipper selected for the customs debt to be paid by the consignee at the moment of shipping. It is possible for the shipper to financially take care of the customs debt
 (duty, taxes and brokerage charges) if he signs the attached Letter of Acceptance (of the charges) 
 
 
 Met vriendelijke groet/Kind regards, 
 
Huu-Hiep Nguyen
 
UPS Douanezaken | Customs Department 
Brokerage Specialist 
Tel Brokerage + 31 (0) 40 2224648 
 Mail Brokerage :
nlbrokerage@ups.com
 / douanezaken@ups.com 
 
Dear Client, as of July 1th, 2021, there are significant changes to the European Union’s Value Added Tax (VAT) rules impacting imports into the EU valued up to €150.
 
 We are happy to advice you to prepare for this, more information can be found via the following link: 
 https://www.ups.com/us/en/services/international-shipping/help-and-advice.page
 
 
 <image001.png>

 What does this mean for me? Do I need to do anything or will it automatically sort itself out? This is staring to become one of the worst experiences of my life with shipping, this was supposed to be a review published over a week ago and
 I am held accountable for loss of profit due to this. 
 
 
 
 
 When can I expect the shipment to arrive? Thanks 
 
 
 
 
 Med vänlig hälsning 
 
 Alex Reinholdsson

 For Haptics, we'll only be sending you the Vam Pro, as we don't need a comparison video. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On Tue, Aug 12, 2025 19:08 PM Alex Reinholdsson<alexander.reinholdsson@gmail.com>
 wrote: 
 
 
 Hi! 
 
 
 
 
 
 So based on the email and the help inhale from various riders during my reviews and the fact that my raceteam have some riders with 5-9k in irating. I would say that the pro pedals
 is the ones I should use. Since I am letting pro drivers use the pedals as well. 
 
 
 
 
 
 Also the fact that I have had people asking me about the pro pedals. Or if you want to send one of each and I do a giveaway for the plus pedals? Looking at the cost for you I don’t
 think it would matter to much if you send the plus or pro? But the value for the video would be higher. 
 
 
 
 
 
 I will look again if I find the info I wanted in the haptics, was a bit unclear on the website. 
 
 
 
 
 
 I will be spending about 25-40 hours in creating content, reels and a review for this project. Also carry that in mind. So maybe content on both is even more precious for you? A video
 comparing the two steps for people so the my know which one to choose? 
 
 
 
 
 
 Med vänlig hälsning
 
 
 Alex Reinholdsson 
 
 
 +46(0)738 - 24 33 88 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12 aug. 2025 kl. 13:00 skrev service@simsonn.com: 
 
 
 
 
 ﻿
 
 
 
 Hi Alexander Reinholdsson, 
 
Pro X Ultra and Plus X are our two latest pedal models. Pro X Ultra is equipped with an adjustable hydraulic lever and is designed for experienced professional riders. The pedal features a lighting system that provides feedback based on game telemetry data,
 with more sophisticated lighting effects and styling. If these features are not required, the Plus 
We have below a rough description of the upgrade points we have made to the pedal, and hopefully it will provide you with some ideas for your review shoot. 
One of the most important upgrades is the braking system. We've introduced a completely redesigned elastomer unit: the red, yellow and blue elastomers have durometer ratings of 60, 70 and 80HA respectively, and have recommended maximum force limits of 60kg,
 100kg and 140kg respectively, although in practice they're capable of withstanding much higher forces. The blue elastomers are fully capable of withstanding 200kg. A wide selection of shims are available, allowing up to 128 different combinations with the
 elastomers to fine-tune pedal stiffness. 
When it comes to the hydraulic cushioning system, we've moved away from our previous misguided use of air springs (which weren't ideal) and are now using a completely redesigned hydraulic rod. 
You can elaborate on what it's like to use this hydraulic cushioning system. The throttle uses a one-way hydraulic lever, and the clutch and brakes use a two-way hydraulic lever. The bi-directional lever has the same hydraulic cushioning feeling back and forth,
 while the uni-directional lever has a hydraulic cushioning when pressed, but the rebound is smooth. This design is to prevent the hydraulic lever from affecting the throttle rebound speed. Limit sleeve we also upgraded, we use a softer material, hard pedal
 to the end will not have a strong sense of frustration. The new control box is made of metal with a closed design, which enhances the anti-jamming ability and adds a Rumble Motor hole to support Simsonn's original Rumble Motor. Plus X pedals come with the
 official SIMSONN Manager software, so there's no need to manually upgrade the hardware. SIMSONN Manager supports the latest Rumble Motor adjustments and currently supports 8 types of telemetry for vibration feedback and corresponding data adjustments. 
We have also upgraded the limit sleeve, using a softer material so that there is no strong jolt or noise when pressing down hard. The new control box is made of metal with a closed design, enhancing its EMI interference resistance, and adding a Rumble Motor
 hole to support Simsonn's original haptics. SIMSONN Manager supports haptics calibration, currently offering 8 vibration feedback telemetry modes and corresponding data adjustments. However, the number of supported games is limited. If needed, we can provide
 you with the supported game list. For unsupported games, you can use Simhub. Regarding the difference in haptics, the Vam Pro uses a linear motor, while the Vam uses a rumble motor, and their operating principles are different. You can find more information
 online about their specific differences. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Med vänlig hälsning 
 
 Alex Reinholdsson 
 
 
 +46(0)738 - 24 33 88 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1 sep. 2025 kl. 09:52 skrev 
nlbrokerage@ups.com:

 LUGU ENTERPRISE PLAZA, YUELU DISTRI 
 
 
 CT, CHANGSHA, HUNAN, CHINALU GU JIE

 CN 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 De Nederlandse Douane heeft de zending niet vrij gegeven en wil graag de factuur en het betalingsbewijs ontvangen in verband met twijfels over de opgegeven waarde van de goederen. 
 Zij vragen van u: 
 
 
De orginele inkoopfactuur 
Bewijs van betaling 
 Bij het ontbreken van beide ontvangen we graag een verklaring betreffende deze zending 
 Indien u geen reactie geeft gaat de douane zelf een waardebepaling doen wat negatief voor u kan uitvallen. 
 Genoemde bescheiden zo spoedig mailen of sturen naar onderstaand adres. 
 
 O.V.v. Douane trackingnummer 1Z144AW70400437911-144AW737KTD 
 Met vriendelijke groet/Kind regards, 
 Amandeep Kaur Nijjar

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Reinholdsson,    Please do not worry, you can pay this fee initially and provide us with your PayPal account details. We shall cover the vast majority of this expense.
